segments.text: Welcome . Can I help you with anything ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Hi . I'm shopping for my boyfriend's birthday . Do you have any suggestions ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Let's see . How about a nice shirt and tie ? You can't go wrong there .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well . He doesn't wear ties that often .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: We have some nice pants . You can also get him a belt with it .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That sounds good . Which one do you recommend ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: These slacks are very popular . He can wear them to dress up a little or on a normal casual day .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I like them . Do you have matching belts ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: The pants are on sale for $ 40 , and the belt is $ 25 .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What is your return policy just in case he doesn't like them ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Just save the receipt and we will gladly return or exchange them for you .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That sounds great . I'll take them .
segments.speaker: S2
